name: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Experience crystal-clear sound with these premium wireless headphones. Perfect for music lovers and professionals alike.

name: Smart Home Security Camera
description: Keep your home safe with this high-definition smart security camera. Features motion detection and night vision.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Stay comfortable during long work hours with this ergonomic office chair. Adjustable lumbar support and breathable mesh design.

name: 4K Ultra HD Smart TV
description: Enjoy stunning visuals with this 55-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart TV. Comes with built-in streaming apps and voice control.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Take your music anywhere with this compact and powerful Bluetooth speaker. Waterproof and durable design.

name: Electric Pressure Cooker
description: Cook meals faster and healthier with this multi-functional electric pressure cooker. Includes 10 preset cooking programs.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: Dominate the competition with this high-performance gaming laptop. Features a powerful GPU and high refresh rate display.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Enhance your yoga practice with this eco-friendly, non-slip yoga mat. Perfect for beginners and professionals.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Charge your devices effortlessly with this sleek wireless charging pad. Compatible with most smartphones.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Stay hydrated on the go with this durable and stylish stainless steel water bottle. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours.
